author: customer
text: I bought these shoes NWT. The first time I put them on and walked two step across the carpeted floor, the heel popped right off. I took both shoes to a cobbler to put zip soles on and repair the one heel and they showed me that the second shoe also lacked proper adhesive. So I spent another $80 to repair both shoes before adding zip soles that were NWT. I love the style, but would expect a very different product quality from NWT on the RealReal.
title: NWT, but soles fell apart on first few steps on carpet

author: Kimberly
text: I bought shoes that were described as being in "good" condition.  They were in not in good condition at all.  I would rate as them as poor to fair.  Stained, heels and toes worn through and very stiff, felt like they were very old and starting to disintegrate.  Even though these shoes are overpriced when they sell new for $398, $115 for these is no deal.  I returned them but did not think I should have to pay for return shipping on something that was not accurately described and the damage was not disclosed or shown in the pictures.  There should also be a comments box attached to the reason for return.  This was my first and last experience with the Real Real.
title: Should not be listed as "good" condition

author: customer
text: Prices were good and delivery was good.  I ordered 6 items and all were final sale.  One dress mentioned minimal spot to front.  There were actually 6 spots, including 2 ink pen marks, 2 unidentified brown spots and two others.  Took to cleaners but they didn’t all come out.  Bought some “excellent” condition  shoes that were not wearable so I had to take to a shoe repair to get them fixed.  Other items were okay.  I will order again but wasn’t thrilled this time around. I wish I could give a better review because I had had some good buys.  I also wish search engine for produces was more specific.
title: Prices were good and delivery was good

author: Caroline
text: you can find some gems, however you really have to dig through the site and do your research. Often the garments are photographed incorrectly (a skirt as a tube dress, for example) or described incorrectly. The pricing is also all over the place, sometimes a brand new pair of shoes will be $100, but then you will see the same pair of shoes, in worse condition, for 2x the price. Sometimes things on the Realreal are more expensive used than they are new from the brand.
title: you can find some gems, but there are a lot of issues.

author: CT Customer
text: The bag I received was NOT the same bag as pictured in the images (despite the description noting as much). The bag came to me with water marks all over the leather (not patina), pen marks and some sort of white residue. It was not accurate to the description or imagery in the listing. Then TRR wouldn't allow me to return, they said I can consign the bag I received. I just want the bag that I purchased. Such nonsense and a total scam it feels. After reading other reviews, I'm questioning the authenticity of their offerings. BE CAREFUL!
